quality.name: Chronic Dissociation Syndrome
quality.notes: The character receives a -3 penalty on any Willpower test other than spell defense and damage resistance tests.

quality.name: Delusion
quality.notes: The character has a firmly held (false) belief they cannot be persuaded out of. Any attempt to persuade them out of this belief must be counted with a new explanation as to why the belief is still true (from the player).

quality.name: Dementia
quality.notes: The character suffers from extreme memory loss, hallucinations, delusions, and loss of language skills. At the beginning of each scene, the character must roll LOG+WIL and consult the following table for effects.

quality.name: Emotion Leak
quality.notes: The character suffers a -2 to all social tests in which the other person is physically present.

quality.name: Hallucinations
quality.notes: Whenever the character is in a stressful situation they must make a Logic + Willpower (3) test. Failure means they are suffering from audio-visual hallucinations that seem real to the character and must be treated as real. At any point the GM may call for another Logic + Willpower (3) test to see if the hallucinations end. Other characters may assist with these tests by using Logic + Psychology [Mental] (treat this as an assist).

quality.name: Dissociative Identity Disorder
quality.notes: When this quality is taken, the player must divide the skills the character has in half (as evenly as possible). The character is now two people; each person receives half of the total skill list. In stressful situations the currently active person must make a Willpower + Charisma (3) test or switch to the other person. The currently active person may switch voluntarily by making a Willpower + Charisma (5, 1 minute) test.

quality.name: Naga Arms/Legs
quality.notes: This quality just tells chummer the naga don't have arms and legs. Please note, movement will not calculate properly for naga because of this.

quality.name: Sterile
quality.notes: This character can nolonger infect others with HMHVV.

quality.name: History Is Not As Certain As We Are Taught

allof.quality: History Is Not As Certain As We Are Taught
History Is Not As Certain As We Are Taught

quality.name: Merc
quality.notes: Remember to discount one of [Armor, Vehicles, Weapons] manually.

selectskill.limittoskill: Sneaking,Throwing Weapons,Blades,Clubs,Tensile Weapons, Exotic Natural Weapons, Rolling Blades, Chainsaws, Battering Weapons,Unarmed
Sneaking,Throwing Weapons,Blades,Clubs,Tensile Weapons, Exotic Natural Weapons, Rolling Blades, Chainsaws, Battering Weapons,Unarmed

quality.name: Resonant Autosoft
quality.notes: Rating is equal to the lower of RES and 6.

quality.name: Trajectory Mastery
quality.notes: When using a ranged weapon equipped with a Smartgun system or a laser sight, you gain an additional DV for every six ranks that you have in the associated weapon skill, provided the mod applies. Additionally, you always gain +3 accuracy with the weapon. Does not apply with throwing weapons.

quality.name: Deft Thrower
quality.notes: When attacking with a non-explosive throwing weapon, you gain an additional DV for every 6 ranks that you have in the associated weapon skill. This bonus applies for both the Throwing Weapons skill and any Exotic Throwing Weapons skill. When taking the Multiple Attack action with a qualifying throwing weapon, gain +4 to the total dice pool.

quality.name: Augmented Strength Mastery
quality.notes: When using a melee weapon, you gain an additional DV for every six ranks you have in the associated weapon skill. Additionally, you gain +4 accuracy with all melee weapons. You gain an additional Free Action once per combat, on the characters first pass.

quality.name: Corner Shooter
quality.notes: When using a ranged weapon equipped with a Smartgun system, you reduce the penalty from Attacker Firing From Cover With Imaging Device to 0.

quality.name: Master Brawler
quality.notes: Whenever you make a location-specific called-shot with a melee or unarmed weapon, you reduce the called shot penalty by 3.

quality.name: Hard Skin
quality.notes:
The effect of this quality varies based on the type of ware installed.
If orthoskin is installed, for every 2 points of ware rating, gain +1 armor.
If dermal plating is installed, for every 2 points of ware rating, gain +1 armor. For every 3 points of ware rating, gain an auto-success in any soak tests where armor is included.
If smartskin is installed, gain 2 DV with your smartskin melee attacks, and for every 2 points of rating, gain +1 armor.
If a cybertorso is installed, either obvious or synthetic, gain +2 armor and +1 limit to all combat actions.

quality.name: Shock Abrogation Training
quality.notes: Whenever your Platelet Factories or Double Elastin would trigger and reduce the damage taken by 1, you may reduce that damage by 2 instead, to a minimum of 1 total damage received.

quality.name: No Pain, No Gain
quality.notes: You have adapted your nervous system to the sensation of pain and use it as a performance booster. For every 2 boxes of damage compensated for by your Damage Compensator or Adrenaline Pump, gain +1 dice to offensive actions. (Includes ranged/melee attacks, attack actions on the matrix etc)

quality.name: Skillsoft Adaptation
quality.notes: Once per 24 hour period, you may apply edge to a skill test involving an Activesoft, Knowsoft, Linguasoft, Knowledge Hardwire, or Active Hardwire.

quality.name: Redundant Protection
quality.notes: The protection given to your senses have moved beyond just a shield, and become a natural state of being. The weaknesses of biology have no hold on you anymore. You are immune to Called Shot: Shake Up. If you have Eye Protectors, you are immune to Called Shot: Eye. If you have Ear Protectors or Dampers, you are immune to Called Shot: Ear.

quality.name: Instinctive Optimization
quality.notes: Immediately before initiative is rolled, you may make either a Tag action or a Calibrate action. The effects of this action are applied before initiative is ordered for the first pass.
